SelectionManager
Manages WorldEdit-style position selections for players Players can select two corners to define a cuboid region
SelectionManager.Selection
 
SpawnNpcCommand
The type Spawn npc command.
SpawnViolentNpcCommand
Command to create and manage violent NPCs with WorldEdit-style selection Selection Commands: /npc violent pos1 - Set first position of spawn area at player location /npc violent pos2 - Set second position of spawn area at player location /npc violent selection - View current selection /npc violent clearsel - Clear current selection NPC Management: /npc violent create - Create new violent NPC with current selection /npc violent setarea - Update spawn area for NPC using current selection /npc violent setstats - Set NPC stats /npc violent setcount - Set max spawn count /npc violent setrespawn - Set respawn delay /npc violent spawn - Force spawn the NPC /npc violent despawn - Despawn all entities for NPC /npc violent list - List all violent NPCs /npc violent remove - Remove a violent NPC
TrackingMannequinEntity
 
TradeData
Represents trading data for an NPC
TradeData.ItemStackSerializer
 
TradeData.Trade
 
TradeData.TradeSerializer
 
TradeEditorGui
Admin GUI for editing NPC trades Layout (chest 9x6): Each row represents one trade: [X][O2][O1] [Info] ...
TradeGui
Player-facing trading GUI (villager-style)
ViolentNpcChunkCleanup
Cleans up invalid violent NPCs as chunks load
ViolentNpcDeathCallback
Event callback for when a violent NPC dies Other mods can register listeners to be notified when violent NPCs are killed Example usage in another mod: ViolentNpcDeathCallback.EVENT.register((world, entity, npcId, name, entityType, damageSource) -> { // Your custom logic here System.out.println("Violent NPC " + name + " (ID: " + npcId + ") was killed!"); });
ViolentNpcEntity
Server-side only violent NPC spawner Uses vanilla entity types so no client-side mod is required Marks entities with NBT data to track them
ViolentNpcEntityRegistration
Event handler for violent NPC deaths Register this in your mod initialization
ViolentNpcRegistry
Registry for Violent NPCs - hostile entities with custom stats
